channel.title: Benz Desi Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Your South Asian Christian Music Fix
channel.itunes:author: Ben Lall
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast for south asians in Hinglish - a mixture of Hindi and English. For immigrants who miss listening to their music as well as for encouragement in experiences of being strangers in a strange land.

item.title: Episode#10
item.itunes:author: Ben Lall
item.itunes:subtitle: Podcasting from India
item.itunes:summary: Trying to get back into the habit of posting new episodes

item.title: Merry Christmas 2007
item.itunes:author: Ben Lall
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode Nine
item.itunes:summary: Wishing you a very Merry Christmas.
item.itunes:keywords: masihi,desi,indian christian,anil kant,ernest mall,ben lall,ajit horo,geet,zaboor,bhajan,worship,south asian,christian,Hindi,Urdu,Punjabi,Indian,masihi

item.title: Back again
item.itunes:author: Ben Lall
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode Eight
item.itunes:summary: Would you believe it - it has been one year already since I first set up the podcast!! Thank You for listening, I appreciate you. This is a praise episode wit Ajit Horo, Rupesh Pannalal, Hareesh Paul and Austin Raj Rattan.
item.itunes:keywords: masihi,desi,indian christian,anil kant,ernest mall,ben lall,ajit horo,geet,zaboor,bhajan,worship,south asian,christian,Hindi,Urdu,Punjabi,Indian,masihi

item.title: Happy Good Friday
item.itunes:author: Ben Lall
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode Seven
item.itunes:summary: Is Good Friday good for you?? I remember couple of older gentlemen wishing me a Happy Good Friday when I was very young. They thought that they were making fun of a Christian remembering the death of his Saviour. Little did they know that the joke was on them. He is risen, He is risen indeed.
